resources.string:
Version 2.0
 Just traveled to Mauritania!

 Couldn’t communicate due to language barrier!

 There is the solution!

 “Hassania for Tourists” is an easy to use application that will help you to speak Hassania (the local dialect in Mauritania). The advantage of this application is the easy to use interface and real life situation where strangers normally are obliged to use Hassania to make their adventure more interesting. “hassania for Tourists” an application, built by Mauritanians, To try to help Tourists to make their experience more interesting.
